subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Opportunity Recognition: Seeing What Others Miss
description: Learn Opportunity Recognition: Seeing What Others Miss in one minute.

hook.text: Howard Schultz visited Italy and saw espresso bars on every corner. America had none. Starbucks was born.

buildup.text: Opportunity recognition is the ability to spot gaps between what exists and what could exist.

discovery.text: Research shows it's not luck. It's 'entrepreneurial alertness'â€”a trained sensitivity to unmet needs.

twist.text: The best opportunities hide in frustration. Every complaint is a business model waiting to be built.

climax.text: Sara Blakely cut the feet off her pantyhose and thought: someone should sell these. Then she did.

quiz.question: What is 'entrepreneurial alertness'?
options: A trained sensitivity to gaps and unmet needs in the market
The ability to predict stock market trends
A personality trait only found in serial entrepreneurs
